Brett (September 3, 1903 na September 7, 1989) bụ onye America na-echekwa ihe na onye edemede.

A mụrụ Brett na Darien, Connecticut ma nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya na Woodstock, Vermont, na Fairfield, Connecticut.  Brett bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Taft, Williams College, na Yale School of Forestry.

Brett jere ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ (nke a họpụtara na 1926) na onye isi njikwa nke Macmillan Publishing.  Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, Brett bụ onye njikwa azụmahịa nke Ọbá Akwụkwọ Ọha New York site n'afọ 1947 ruo 1953.
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1953, Brett kwagara Vermont, ebe o hibere ugbo osisi nwere ebe obibi maka anụ ọhịa na Hawk's Hill na East Barnard
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta nke Kansụl Natural Resources Vermont
Brett mechara nye ọrụ ugbo osisi Hawk's Hill nye New England Foretry  Foundation.
Brett jere ozi na Army Air Corps n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ.
